file_content.text: Look at the size of that thing!
I can't tell if it's impressive... Or a giant heap of junk.
I can't live like this!
Please, my darling. We'll land on our feet--just give it time.
We live like vermin here. Feeding off the scraps of others. At least on Zakuul, I had my dignity.
There's nothing for us on Zakuul. Arcann saw to that.
I thought you left already!
Can't. Oggo's at it again--shooting people in the streets. The only thing free in the Free Zone is a blaster bolt to the chest.
He's still better than the other guy.
Fresh--err--hot gorak! Skewered, fried, then roasted to perfection! Food that'll leave you thinking about it for hours!
I'll take three--no, four! Hold the sauce.
You get what I ask for?
Yeah, but it's gonna cost you extra. Lost one of my best guys smuggling this out of Breaktown.
Not Rhax?
Afraid so.
I'll throw in an extra whiskey's worth of credits. For Rhax.
The good stuff. Not the cheap swill they serve around here.
Could be both. Think they'll let us work on it?
Do you really want to?
Good point.
